FUSE.LearnMore.MusicAndPrivacy: We want to find you the music you’ll love. So when you use Apple Music, we remember the songs and videos you stream, the ways you Connect and the content you engage with to help you discover new favourites. If you want to learn more about our collection practices, you can do so at @@Link@@.
